NODE.doctext:
The E2 todo list.
  1. come up with some tests for QAuser to execute.
  2. Figure out the system groups. (core everything has node ids in 0 to X range, either inheiritence or special nodetypes)
  3. add "ratings" an impliment rudimentary form of user karma
  4. add link displays
  5. replace current systems (perlmonks, hernandez, fezfamily, oostendorp.net) with new 'containers' and nodelets
  6. alter table columns to be NOT NULL DEFAULT=0
  7. lock pages on edit page load
  8. some ability to add HTML-filtering to Text fields (no table tags, etc)
  9. enhance the "note - reply" system
  10. THE BIG ONE: Everything.blockstackers.com
Completed items
  • Item completed: date : who
  • core system now in CVS
  • fix the update bug (foreign rows not being properly nuked in update)
  • Foreign keys are the same as node ids...
NODE.title: Everything 2 Todo list
